title: Course Schedule
content: There are a total of courses you have to take, labeled from 0 to . Some courses may have prerequisites, for example to take course 0 you have to first take course 1, which is expressed as a pair: Given the total number of courses and a list of prerequisite pairs, is it possible for you to finish all courses? The input prerequisites is a graph represented by a list of edges, not adjacency matrices. Read more about how a graph is represented. You may assume that there are no duplicate edges in the input prerequisites.
